summary: [Blocked 2025-10-07] Automate market/macro data ingestion for relay case studies (deferred until systemic backlog guard restores pending work)

steps.title: Design data catalogue
steps.notes: List required indicators (FRED, IMF/BIS, on-chain, company filings) and map each to a fetch command.

steps.title: Implement ingestion scripts
steps.notes: Create CLI/notebook helpers that download the indicators and store receipts under `_report/usage/data/`.

steps.title: Automate refresh + summaries
steps.notes: Add workflow/cron to refresh data on schedule and emit digestible summaries consumed by case studies.

checkpoint.description: Live data ingestion runs on schedule with receipts and human-readable summaries
